registration.heading: Patient Registration
registration.content: Today, {{ this.queries.newPatientsHbb.total + this.queries.returningPatientsHbb.total }} patients were registered; {{ this.queries.newPatientsHbb.total }} patients new to the hospital, and {{ this.queries.returningPatientsHbb.total }} returning.

hbb.heading: HBB Cash Box
hbb.content: {{ this.queries.auxCashHbb.total }} were introduced at the Caisse Aux HBB, paid against a total of {{ this.queries.auxCashTotalInvoiceHbb.total }} invoices.

pax.heading: PAX Cash Box
pax.content: {{ this.queries.auxCashPax.total }} were introduced at the Caisse Aux PAX, paid against a total of {{ this.queries.auxCashTotalInvoicePax.total }} invoices.

subsidy.heading: IMA Subsidy
subsidy.content: The IMA subsidy was charged a total of {{ this.queries.imaSubsidyTotal.total }} enabling {{ this.queries.imaSubsidyPatients.total }} patients to receive health care.

incomeExpense.heading: Income/ Expenditure
incomeExpense.content: Today, a value of {{ this.queries.principalCashIncomeHbb.total }} was recorded as entering the principal cash box; a value of {{ this.queries.principalCashExpenseHbb.total }} was recorded as expense.

balance.heading: Balance
balance.content: The balance reported by the principal cash box has a value of {{ this.queries.principalCashBalanceHbb.total}}.

sale.heading: Invoice
sale.content: {{ this.queries.totalSalesHbb.total}} invoice transactions were submitted; this includes both hospitalised and outpatient invoices.

fiche.heading: Fiche Consultation
fiche.content: A total of {{ this.queries.newFicheSalesHbb + this.queries.oldFicheSalesHbb }} charges were made for fiche consultations; {{ this.queries.newFicheSalesHbb }} for 'Nouvelle Fiche' and {{ this.queries.oldFicheSalesHbb }} for 'Anciennce Fiche'.

info.heading: Info
info.content: Please note this is an automated report based on data captured by BHIMA. It is intended to provide transparent financial and system health information to the administration of IMCK. This message will not be shown again.

pax.heading: PAX
pax.content: BHIMA is currently being installed at PAX. Following reports will include data for the enterprise as a whole, including both HBB and PAX.

network.heading: [Network Manager]
network.content: The radio connection between HBB and PAX could not be established today.

upgrade.heading: [ADMIN]
upgrade.content: The system is currently being upgraded.
